content:
#22851 fills in some more missing API for LinearIndepOn, including versions of the definition involving Finset sums, and a lemma for pairs that works in general rings, which is then used to golf existing proofs for linear independence of pairs.

Finally, it includes two lemmas that relate the ENat-cardinality of s to dimension for linearly independent s. It has a 'large import' tag because of this, because it requires the Dimension files to import Set.Card. I don't know how much of a technical tradeoff this is, but I think that the lemmas belong where they are, all other things being equal.
Oops! Can someone with powers please move this?
This topic was moved here from #Is there code for X? > #22851 More LinearIndepOn by Bryan Gin-ge Chen.
